channel.title: Vaccines on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccines on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop
item.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.

item.title: States Are Moving to Protect Access to Vaccines
item.description: As federal vaccine policy shifts under US health secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., lawmakers are looking to give state-level public health officials authority to ignore federal recommendations.

item.title: States Are Moving to Protect Access to Vaccines
item.description: As federal vaccine policy shifts under US health secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., lawmakers are looking to give state-level public health officials authority to ignore federal recommendations.

item.title: Measles Cases Are Soaring in Mexico
item.description: The disease has claimed the lives of 12 people in the country this year, with the virus continuing to spread rapidly.

item.title: Measles Cases Are Soaring in Mexico
item.description: The disease has claimed the lives of 12 people in the country this year, with the virus continuing to spread rapidly.

item.title: RFK Jr. wants to change program that stopped vaccine makers from leaving US market
item.description: RFK Jr. is targeting a little-known program that underpins childhood immunizations in the US.

item.title: Trump admin squanders nearly 800,000 vaccines meant for Africa: Report
item.description: The mpox vaccines were pledged under the Biden administration.

item.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
item.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.
